definition:
If $f : X\to Y$ is a continuous map of topological spaces and
$\mathcal{F}$ is a sheaf on $X$, the [*direct image*]{} sheaf,
$f_*\mathcal{F}$ on $Y$ is defined by

$(f_*\mathcal{F})(V) = \mathcal{F}(f^{-1}(V))$

for open sets $V\subset Y$, with the restriction maps induced from those
of $\mathcal{F}$.
